/usr/local/bin/mpicxx   -std=c++11 -O3 -DNDEBUG -isysroot /Library/Developer/CommandLineTools/SDKs/MacOSX10.15.sdk -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names  CMakeFiles/write_vtk.dir/write_vtk.cpp.o CMakeFiles/write_vtk.dir/writer.cpp.o  -o write_vtk /usr/local/Cellar/open-mpi/4.1.2/lib/libmpi.dylib
